learning_objectives.description: Recognise line symmetry and order of rotational symmetry in two dimensions.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Includes properties of triangles, quadrilaterals and polygons directly related to their symmetries.

learning_objectives.description: Recognise symmetry properties of prisms, cylinders, pyramids and cones.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. identify planes and axes of symmetry.
